entry.title: Dress Me Up, Take Me Nowhere
entry.content:
A few months back, when I got full-time permanent employment, I went shopping. Not just to celebrate - mostly because every work-wearable shirt I owned had some sort of food stain on it.

And this morning, I thought I was safe with the long sleeve tshirt I selected. Wrong - there's a mystery stain on THIS one as well. Argh. Bibs would be welcome.
